# Security Policy

## Scope

This repository contains **planning and governance documentation only**. There is no deployed code, no runtime services, and no user-facing applications. The only executable-adjacent artifacts are YAML/Python workflow specifications in `github-actions-spec.md`, which are not deployed from this repository.

## Reporting

If you discover sensitive information that was accidentally committed (credentials, tokens, private URLs), please email the repository owner directly rather than opening a public issue.

Contact: Open a private vulnerability report via GitHub's Security tab on this repository.

## Out of Scope

Since this repository contains no deployed code or services, the following are out of scope:

- Software vulnerabilities (there is no software to exploit)
- Denial of service (there are no services)
- Infrastructure issues (there is no infrastructure)

## Dependencies

This repository has no software dependencies, no package manifests, and no build system.
